hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: On second thought, let's not go to Hyrule Castle. 'Tis a silly place.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #2# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Goron Pot's happy face# spits out #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ Larvae Room Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #Dampé's Grave#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Top

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that wearing the #Skull Mask in the Deku Theater# rewards #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of #time#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Fire Temple#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Did you know that Stalchildren leave you alone when wearing the Bunny Hood?

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #4# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found in #Goron City#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Map of the Spirit Temple# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Nayru's Love#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Nayru's Love#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Stone of Agony#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern MQ Iron Boots Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Queen Gohma#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Stone of Agony#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #an Ice Trap#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Third Left Chest
